text: Brian Current is a Canadian composer. He won the Juno Award for Classical Composition of the Year in 2015 for the opera Airline Icarus.Brian Current Winner of $50,000 Azrieli Commissioning Competition, Azrieli Foundation]Composer Brian Current Among Winners of 2015 JUNO AWARDS, Canadian Music Centre ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Living people Category:Canadian composers Category:Juno Award for Classical Composition of the Year winners Category:Jules Léger Prize for New Chamber Music winners Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Brian Current
